nodes.text: Myo was a fight-loving Abyssin from Byss. An expert in survival techniques, Myo was a tough Abyssin with regenerative abilities. Myo was present in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina on Tatooine on the day that Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and Luke Skywalker were forced into a bar brawl with Ponda Baba and Cornelius Evazan. He was employed with the Galactic Outdoor Survival School.
